text:
Serge Telle (born 5 May 1955) is a French diplomat. He has served as the Minister of State of Monaco since February 2016. Telle is a knight of the Legion of Honour and the National Order of Merit. He is also a commander of the Order of Saint-Charles. He was born in Nantes.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Telle tested positive for COVID-19.
